title: A reply to two discourses lately printed at Oxford concerning the adoration of our blessed Savior in the Holy Eucharist
author: Aldrich, Henry, 1647-1710.
notes: A reply to Abraham Woodhead's Two discourses concerning the adoration of our blessed Saviour.
Written by Henry Aldrich. Cf. BM.
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
